title: i unlocked skin with "skin boost" and my skin is not available.
body: i managed to get hextech janna off skin boost activation.  and after the game was over, it wasn't available anymore.

replies.body: Do you mean the boost during ARAM champion select?  This feature gives you 100 IP and unlocks a skin for only the duration of that match.  These are not permanent unlocks!  The temporary skins should be available to unlock permanently through either the store of hextech crafting.  Hope this helps clear things up!
